%title less css 同样样式集合
%template article

收集一些常用的less集合

=== 文字自动隐藏 ===

{{{less
  .text-overflow() {
    overflow: hidden;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
    white-space: nowrap;
  }
}}}

=== css3相关 ===

{{{less
  .border-radius(@radius) {
    -webkit-border-radius: @radius;
    -moz-border-radius: @radius;
    border-radius: @radius;
  }
  .opacity(@opacity) {
    opacity: @opacity / 100;
    filter: ~"alpha(opacity=@{opacity})";
  }
}}}

=== border实现三角 ===

{{{less
  //border实现三角
  #arrow {
    .common(){
      width: 0;
      height: 0;
      font-size: 0;
      line-height: 0;
    }
    .top(@w, @h, @color, @bg: #fff) {
      border-left: @w solid @bg;
      border-right: @w solid @bg;
      order-bottom: @h solid @color;
    }

    .bottom(@w, @h, @color, @bg: #fff) {
      border-left: @w solid @bg;
      border-right: @w solid @bg;
      border-top: @h solid @color;
    }
  }
}}}

=== 所有 ===

{{{brush:less
  .ui-box-inline {
    .inline-block;
  }
  .ui-box-img {
    display: block;
    img { display: block; }
  }
  .ui-text-hide {
    .hide-text;
  }
  .ui-box-img {
    display: block;
    .img {
      display: block;
    }
  }
  .inline-block() {
    display: inline-block;
    *display: inline;
    *zoom: 1;
  }
  .hide-text() {
    font: 0/0 a;
    color: transparent;
    text-shadow: none;
    background-color: transparent;
    border: 0;
  }
  .text-hide() {
    text-indent: -9999em;
  }
  .center-block() {
    display: block;
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;
  }
  .text-overflow() {
    overflow: hidden;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
    white-space: nowrap;
  }

  .border-radius(@radius) {
    -webkit-border-radius: @radius;
    -moz-border-radius: @radius;
    border-radius: @radius;
  }
  .opacity(@opacity) {
    opacity: @opacity / 100;
    filter: ~"alpha(opacity=@{opacity})";
  }

  .fontHead(){
    font-family:"\5FAE\8F6F\96C5\9ED1", arial;
  }

  //border实现三角

    .common(){
      width: 0;

    }
    .top(@w, @h, @color, @bg: #fff) {

      border-bottom: @h solid @color;
    }

    .bottom(@w, @h, @color, @bg: #fff) {

      border-top: @h solid @color;
